settings.subtitle: The UK's leading fixings and fasteners brand. Invicta Tools stocks the full Timco range â€” over 6,800 products covering screws, nails, bolts, anchors, adhesives, and PPE. If you need to fix it, fasten it, or secure it, Timco has it.

settings.title: The UK's Fixings & Fasteners Specialist
settings.paragraph_1: Timco is one of the UK's largest importers and wholesalers of screws, fixings, fasteners, nails, and power tool accessories. With a massive UK warehouse operation, Timco delivers trade-quality fixings at competitive prices with colour-coded packaging for easy identification.
settings.paragraph_2: From the award-winning C2 multi-purpose screw to FirmaHold collated nails, Timco products are designed by tradespeople for tradespeople. Every product is tested to meet or exceed British and European standards, and their innovative packaging makes finding the right fixing fast and simple.

settings.title: Structural Construction
settings.description: Heavy-duty coach screws, through bolts, anchor fixings, and structural timber connectors. Timco fixings hold buildings together â€” literally. Tested and certified to European standards.

settings.title: Joinery & Carpentry
settings.description: C2 multi-purpose screws, C2 Deck-Fix, and C2 Tongue-Fix for every timber application. Twin-cut technology reduces splitting and delivers a perfect countersink every time.

settings.title: First Fix & Framing
settings.description: FirmaHold collated nails for framing nailers, ring shank nails for extra hold, and galvanised nails for exterior use. Compatible with all major nailer brands.

settings.title: Plumbing & Mechanical
settings.description: Pipe clips, saddle bands, munsen rings, and threaded rod. Stainless steel and zinc-plated options for internal and external installations. Trade boxes for bulk usage.

settings.title: Drylining & Plastering
settings.description: Drywall screws, cavity fixings, spring toggles, and plasterboard plugs. Specialist fixings for hollow walls that grip securely and hold heavy loads without damage.

settings.title: Who Uses Timco?
settings.subtitle: Every trade relies on the right fixings â€” Timco covers them all

settings.title: C2 Multi-Purpose Screws
settings.description: The award-winning C2 is a high-performance multi-purpose screw engineered for every timber application. Twin-cut technology reduces splitting, the dual-angle partial thread pulls materials tight, and the ribs under the head deliver a clean countersink without pre-drilling.

settings.title: FirmaHold Collated Nails
settings.description: Premium collated nails and gas fuel cells compatible with all major first fix nailer brands including Paslode, DeWalt, and Makita. Ring shank, smooth shank, and galvanised options in every common length. Trade boxes with fuel cells included.

settings.title: Timco Essentials
settings.subtitle: The fixings and fasteners that professionals reach for every day

settings.title: Products In Stock
settings.description: Invicta Tools carries the full Timco range â€” 6,888 products making up 54% of our entire catalogue. Whatever fixing you need, we almost certainly have it in stock and ready to ship.

settings.title: Award-Winning Screws
settings.description: The C2 multi-purpose screw won industry awards for its twin-cut technology. Reduces splitting, self-countersinks, and works across softwood, hardwood, MDF, chipboard, and composite decking.

settings.title: Trade Pricing
settings.description: Timco products are competitively priced for the trade. Bulk trade packs keep your cost per fixing low, and free next-day delivery on orders over Â£30 means no wasted trips to the merchants.

settings.title: Fully Certified
settings.description: All structural fixings are CE marked and tested to British and European standards. Full technical data sheets and load tables available for specifiers and building control sign-off.

settings.title: Warehouse & Support
settings.description: Timco operates from a massive UK warehouse ensuring fast, reliable supply. No waiting for imports â€” stock is held in the UK and ready for next-day dispatch to your door or site.

settings.title: Colour-Coded System
settings.description: Timco's innovative colour-coded packaging makes finding the right fixing instant. Each product category has a distinct colour â€” no more rummaging through mixed boxes on site.

settings.title: Why Professionals Choose Timco
settings.subtitle: The UK's most comprehensive fixings range at trade-friendly prices

settings.title: Screws & Woodscrews
settings.description: C2 multi-purpose, deck screws, drywall screws, coach screws, self-tapping, and machine screws. Every type, every size, every finish.

settings.title: Nails & FirmaHold
settings.description: Collated nails, round wire nails, oval nails, panel pins, and FirmaHold gas packs. For hand nailing and all major nailer brands.

settings.title: Bolts, Anchors & Fixings
settings.description: Through bolts, anchor fixings, cavity fixings, chemical anchors, and threaded rod. Heavy-duty solutions for structural and mechanical applications.

settings.title: The Timco C2 Multi-Purpose Screw
settings.description: See why the C2 is the UK's favourite multi-purpose screw. Twin-cut technology, self-countersinking head, and no pre-drilling required â€” watch it perform across timber, MDF, and composite materials.
